newsitem.title: USA: Bell Atlantic justice O.K. may spur mergers.
newsitem.headline: Bell Atlantic justice O.K. may spur mergers.

text.p: The unconditional approval by the U.S. Department of Justice for the $20 billion Bell Atlantic Corp merger with NYNEX Corp on Thursday raises the chances that other U.S. telephone firms may try to combine.
Share analysts said that the merger is almost certain to go ahead now this crucial approval has been secured. But projected cost savings must materialise to spur other deals.
"If Bell Atlantic and NYNEX prove that there are large cost savings other (phone companies) may look hard at such deals too," said Bill Deatherage of brokers Bear Stearns.
